titleStmt.title: Merlini Anglici errata. Or, The errors, mistakes, and mis-applications of Master Lilly's new ephemeris for the yeare 1647. Discovered, refuted, and corrected. By C. George Wharton, student in astronomy.
titleStmt.author: Wharton, George, Sir, 1617-1681.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by Wing.
Thomason received his copy in December 1646.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Appears in catalogue and on film as C.54.aa.1.(4).
